# Pull Request

## Summary
- What changed and why?

## Checklist
- [ ] Types compile (`npm run typecheck`)
- [ ] No new ESLint errors (`npm run lint`), or justified
- [ ] No API/DB/type contract changes (or proposal approved)
- [ ] Followed @docs/CONVENTIONS.md guardrails
- [ ] Tests/docs updated if behavior or public types changed
- [ ] Short change summary included
